Special Powers
ROLE TAG: Ally
TO KILL HAL JORDAN: SIDELINE ACTIVE, UNIQUE MODIFIER - Friendly Captains and Sidekicks modify attack +1 when attacking 1+ a characters with the Green Lantern Corps keyword.
LEADER OF THE ZAMARONS: Leadership. // UNIQUE MODIFIER - When Star Sapphire uses it and succeeds, friendly characters modify defense +1 until your next turn.
